name: Best WP Testimonial
author: Hasibul Islam Badsha

sections.description:
Best WP Testimonial is a WordPress plugin to display your client review or testimonial in your WordPress website.

Plugin Documentation: https://www.e2softsolution.com/blog/best-wp-testimonial/

  • Live Demo
  • Need Help?
  • About Author

Video Tutorial

You can changes settings

  • Color Theme – You can changes color theme.
  • Hover Color – You can changes hover color.
  • Display Post – You can display number of post.
  • Auto Play – You can set auto play.
  • Display Navigation – You can show/off navigation.

You can select/change

  • Number of Post.
  • jQuaery Settings.
  • Background Color.
  • Text Color.
  • Text Hover Color.
  • All are dynamic.

You can make my day by submitting a positive review on WordPress.org!

Usage

  • Go to your Dashboard after installation and navigate to “Testimonial >> Settings” to configure the testimonial.

Features

  • Very easy installation
  • Shortcode system
  • Unlimited color variation by using jQuery color picker.
  • Responsive design
  • Flexible and easy to use
  • Lightweight JQuery
sections.installation:
1. Upload best-wp-testimonial to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Copy and paste if(function_exists(‘bwpt_testimonial_shortcode’)){bwpt_testimonial_loop();} in template code or [BWPTTESTIMONIAL] in the post/page” to display testimonial.
sections.faq:
Can it possible to use throw shordcode?

Yes.

Could it possible to places this testimonial on post or page?

Yes.
